verses.verse: וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <WH7925> vai-yash-Kem that [were] with him rose up early יְרֻבַּ֜עַל <WH3378> ye-rub-Ba-'al Then Jerubbaal ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he גִדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on, who [is] Gideon וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all manner הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> it-To, for וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- beside עֵ֣ין 'ein חֲרֹ֑ד <WH5878> cha-Rod; beside the well of Harod וּמַחֲנֵ֤ה <WH4264> u-ma-cha-Neh so that the host מִדְיָן֙ <WH4080> mid-Yan of the Midianites הָיָה־ <WH1961> ha-yah- become ל֣וֹ lo מִצָּפ֔וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tza-Fon, were on the north side מִגִּבְעַ֥ת <WH1389> mig-giv-'At of them by the hill הַמּוֹרֶ֖ה <WH4176> ham-mo-Reh of Moreh בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> ba-'E-mek. in the valley

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to גִּדְע֔וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on, unto Gideon רַ֗ב <WH7227> Rav, that [are] with thee [are] too many הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am The people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach, for מִתִּתִּ֥י <WH5414> mit-tit-Ti for me to give אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> mid-Yan the Midianites בְּיָדָ֑ם <WH3027> be-ya-Dam; into their hands פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- would יִתְפָּאֵ֨ר <WH6286> yit-pa-'Er vaunt עָלַ֤י <WH5921> 'a-Lai for יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El lest Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, themselves against me saying יָדִ֖י <WH3027> ya-Di Mine own hand הוֹשִׁ֥יעָה <WH3467> ho-Shi-'ah hath saved לִּֽי׃ Li.

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah, henceforth קְרָ֨א <WH7121> ke-Ra proclaim נָ֜א <WH4994> na Now therefore go to בְּאָזְנֵ֤י <WH241> be-'a-ze-Nei in the ears הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am of the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- any יָרֵ֣א <WH3373> ya-Re Whosoever [is] fearful וְחָרֵ֔ד <WH2730> ve-cha-Red, and afraid יָשֹׁ֥ב <WH7725> ya-Sho let him return וְיִצְפֹּ֖ר <WH6852> ve-yitz-Por and depart early מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> me-Har from mount הַגִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> hag-gil-'Ad; Gilead וַיָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov And there returned מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, of the people עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> 'es-Rim twenty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> u-she-Na-yim and two אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef, thousand וַעֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> va-'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand נִשְׁאָֽרוּ׃ <WH7604> nish-'A-ru. and there remained ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on, unto Gideon עוֹד֮ <WH5750> 'Od are still הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> ha-'Am The people רָב֒ <WH7227> rav [are] yet [too] many הוֹרֵ֤ד <WH3381> ho-Red bring them down אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> o-Tam אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim, unto the water וְאֶצְרְפֶ֥נּוּ <WH6884> ve-'etz-re-Fen-nu and I will try לְךָ֖ le-Cha שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> Sham; there וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher of whom אֹמַ֨ר <WH559> 'o-Mar them for thee there and it shall be [that] of whom I say אֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha to you זֶ֣ה׀ <WH2088> zeh This יֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> ye-Lech shall go אִתָּ֗ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach, for ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu he יֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> ye-Lech shall go אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach, but וְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> ve-Chol everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- of whom אֹמַ֜ר <WH559> 'o-Mar with thee and of whomsoever I say אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha, about זֶ֚ה <WH2088> zeh one לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not יֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> ye-Lech go עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> 'im-Mach, with ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not יֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> ye-Lech. go

וַיּ֥וֹרֶד <WH3381> vai-Yo-red So he brought down אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim; unto the water ס sa-Mek וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh and the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on, unto Gideon כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> kol everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who יָלֹק֩ <WH3952> ya-Lok Every one that lappeth בִּלְשׁוֹנ֨וֹ <WH3956> bil-sho-No with his tongue מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הַמַּ֜יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim of the water כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher who יָלֹ֣ק <WH3952> ya-Lok lappeth הַכֶּ֗לֶב <WH3611> hak-Ke-lev, as a dog תַּצִּ֤יג <WH3322> tatz-Tzig him shalt thou set אוֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To לְבָ֔ד <WH905> le-Vad, shall separate וְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> ve-Chol everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who יִכְרַ֥ע <WH3766> yich-Ra' by himself likewise every one that boweth down עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon בִּרְכָּ֖יו <WH1290> bir-Kav upon his knees לִשְׁתּֽוֹת׃ <WH8354> lish-Tot. to drink

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become מִסְפַּ֞ר <WH4557> mis-Par And the number הַֽמֲלַקְקִ֤ים <WH3952> ha-ma-lak-Kim of them that lapped בְּיָדָם֙ <WH3027> be-ya-Dam [putting] their hand אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פִּיהֶ֔ם <WH6310> pi-Hem, to their mouth שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> she-Losh were three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish; men וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> ve-Chol all יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> Ye-ter but all the rest הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, of the people כָּרְע֥וּ <WH3766> ka-re-'U bowed down עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon בִּרְכֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1290> bir-chei-Hem upon their knees לִשְׁתּ֥וֹת <WH8354> lish-Tot to drink מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. water ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- unto גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on, unto Gideon בִּשְׁלֹשׁ֩ <WH7969> bish-Losh By the three מֵא֨וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred הָאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish men הַֽמֲלַקְקִים֙ <WH3952> ha-ma-lak-Kim that lapped אוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <WH3467> o-Shi-a' will I save אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti you and deliver אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> mid-Yan the Midianites בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha; into thine hand וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, and let all the [other] people יֵלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> ye-le-Chu go אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man לִמְקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> lim-ko-Mo. unto his place

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֵדָה֩ <WH6720> tze-Dah victuals הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> ha-'Am So the people בְּיָדָ֜ם <WH3027> be-ya-Dam in their hand וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> ve-'Et שׁוֹפְרֹֽתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH7782> shof-ro-tei-Hem, and their trumpets וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> 'ish all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El [the rest of] Israel שִׁלַּח֙ <WH7971> shil-Lach and he sent אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man לְאֹֽהָלָ֔יו <WH168> le-'o-ha-Lav, unto his tent וּבִשְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> u-vish-losh- those three מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred הָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> ha-'Ish men הֶֽחֱזִ֑יק <WH2388> he-che-Zik; and retained וּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> u-ma-cha-Neh and the host מִדְיָ֔ן <WH4080> mid-Yan, of Midian הָ֥יָה <WH1961> Ha-yah become ל֖וֹ lo מִתַּ֥חַת <WH8478> mit-Ta-chat Thahash בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> ba-'E-mek. was beneath him in the valley פ Peh

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came בַּלַּ֣יְלָה <WH3915> bal-Lay-lah And it came to pass the same night הַה֔וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, now the same וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> 'e-Lav about יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, that the LORD ק֖וּם <WH6965> kum unto him Arise רֵ֣ד <WH3381> red get thee down בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> bam-ma-cha-Neh; unto the host כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for נְתַתִּ֖יו <WH5414> ne-tat-Tiv for I have delivered בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha. it into thine hand

וְאִם־ <WH518> ve-'im- if יָרֵ֥א <WH3373> ya-Re But if thou fear אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you לָרֶ֑דֶת <WH3381> la-Re-det; to go down רֵ֥ד <WH3381> red down אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you וּפֻרָ֥ה <WH6513> u-fu-Rah thou with Phurah נַעַרְךָ֖ <WH5288> na-'ar-Cha thy servant אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> Ham-ma-cha-Neh. to the host

וְשָֽׁמַעְתָּ֙ <WH8085> ve-sha-ma'-Ta And thou shalt hear מַה־ <WH4100> mah- what יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <WH1696> ye-dab-Be-ru, what they say וְאַחַר֙ <WH310> ve-'a-Char and afterward תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <WH2388> te-che-Zak-nah be strengthened יָדֶ֔יךָ <WH3027> ya-Dei-cha, shall thine hands וְיָרַדְתָּ֖ <WH3381> ve-ya-rad-Ta to go down בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> bam-ma-cha-Neh; unto the host וַיֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> vai-Ye-red Then went he down הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu he וּפֻרָ֣ה <WH6513> u-fu-Rah with Phurah נַעֲר֔וֹ <WH5288> na-'a-Ro, his servant אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to קְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> ke-Tzeh unto the outside הַחֲמֻשִׁ֖ים <WH2571> ha-cha-mu-Shim of the armed men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that was בַּֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> Bam-ma-cha-Neh. that [were] in the host

וּמִדְיָ֨ן <WH4080> u-mid-Yan And the Midianites וַעֲמָלֵ֤ק <WH6002> va-'a-ma-Lek and the Amalekites וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- and all the children קֶ֙דֶם֙ <WH6924> ke-dem of the east נֹפְלִ֣ים <WH5307> no-fe-Lim lay בָּעֵ֔מֶק <WH6010> ba-'E-mek, along in the valley כָּאַרְבֶּ֖ה <WH697> ka-'ar-Beh like grasshoppers לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> la-Ro; for multitude וְלִגְמַלֵּיהֶם֙ <WH1581> ve-lig-mal-lei-Hem and their camels אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein were without מִסְפָּ֔ר <WH4557> mis-Par, [were] without number כַּח֛וֹל <WH2344> ka-Chol as the sand שֶׁעַל־ <WH5921> she-'al- and שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> se-Fat side הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hai-Yam by the sea לָרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> la-Ro. for multitude

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo was come גִדְע֔וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on, And when Gideon וְהִ֨נֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-Hin-neh- behold אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, behold [there was] a man מְסַפֵּ֥ר <WH5608> me-sap-Per that told לְרֵעֵ֖הוּ <WH7453> le-re-'E-hu unto his fellow חֲל֑וֹם <WH2472> cha-Lom; a dream וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold חֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> cha-Lom a dream חָלַ֗מְתִּי <WH2492> cha-Lam-ti, Behold I dreamed וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh Behold; צְלֹול tze-lol כצְלִ֜יל <WH6742> tze-Lil cake קלֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem bread שְׂעֹרִים֙ <WH8184> se-'o-Rim of barley מִתְהַפֵּךְ֙ <WH2015> mit-hap-peCh tumbled בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> be-ma-cha-Neh into the host מִדְיָ֔ן <WH4080> mid-Yan, of Midian וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo and came עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against הָ֠אֹהֶל <WH168> Ha-'o-hel unto a tent וַיַּכֵּ֧הוּ <WH5221> vai-yak-Ke-hu and smote וַיִּפֹּ֛ל <WH5307> vai-yip-Pol it that it fell וַיַּהַפְכֵ֥הוּ <WH2015> vai-ya-haf-Che-hu and turned לְמַ֖עְלָה <WH4605> le-Ma'-lah upside וְנָפַ֥ל <WH5307> ve-na-Fal lay along הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> ha-'O-hel. it that the tent

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> vai-Ya-'an answered רֵעֵ֤הוּ <WH7453> re-'E-hu And his fellow וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein is nothing זֹ֔את <WH2063> Zot, likewise בִּלְתִּ֗י <WH1115> bil-Ti, because אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo חֶ֛רֶב <WH2719> Che-rev This [is] nothing else save the sword גִּדְע֥וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on of Gideon בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> yo-'Ash of Joash אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish a man יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> na-Tan delivered הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him hath God בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> be-ya-Do, [for] into his hand אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִדְיָ֖ן <WH4080> mid-Yan Midian וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> Ham-ma-cha-Neh. and all the host פ Peh
